A description of the imports to add.

```typescript

```

</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

True if `this.pathToImportedModule` represents a package import. False if the imported module path should be relative to the manager's absolute path in generated code.

</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

</td><td>
